d.Name: Process Integration Pipeline - Generic Integration Flows & Templates
d.Description: This integration package contains the generic integration flows required to setup a Process Integration (PI) pipeline on Cloud Integration for asynchronous message processing. More details on the PI pipeline concept can be found on the Migration Guide for SAP Process Orchestration.
d.ShortText: This integration package contains the generic integration flows required to setup a Process Integration pipeline on Cloud Integration for asynchronous message processing incl. templates for setting up the scenario-specific integration flows.
